channel.title: [Delta] Searching help to modify my client
channel.description:
[size=10pt]Hello[/size], I am using an old delta server and client. I need help to modify the client so it sends the object packet to the server, when your are near the object. Example a ladder, I dont want people to click this ladder anywhere and you climb-up, i want it to work as when you click the ladder you walk to it and then you climb up. The client is not refactored, so i cant really read it. I am not really sure if its the client or the server, but i guess its client-related. And yes i know it is possible to fix it in the server source, but that would cause people to disconnect if they spam-click the objects.
Please dont post useless posts about im using delta, i've heard them enough :-)
